fullDescription.intro: Similar to ordinary ReLUs but shifted by theta. f(x) = x for x &gt theta, f(x) = 0 otherwise.
fullDescription.option: Threshold location of activation. A theta of 0 corresponds to an ordinary ReLU.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Thresholded ReLU layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Thresholded ReLU layer.
